attributes.action: Bring a Video Referee into football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A video referee for the referee to confirm desicions with including penalties, sending offs, ball crossing line etc. If football had a video referee then it would cut out poor desicion making and take pressure off referees to ensure no bad desicions are made that may cause the team to lose a vital game.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
